org.intermine.objectstore.query

Class PendingClob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.objectstore.query.ClobAccess
      • org.intermine.objectstore.query.PendingClob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence, Lazy

    public class PendingClob
extends ClobAccess
    Subclass of ClobAccess that contains data to be written to the database instead of access to data already in the database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.intermine.objectstore.query.ClobAccess

        ClobAccess.ClobAccessSubclassFactory
